css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0cf655bf-u{min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);flex-direction:row;-moz-column-gap:6.5%;column-gap:6.5%;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0cf655bf-u{-moz-column-gap:9%;column-gap:9%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0cf655bf-u{justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;row-gap:30px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-0cf655bf-u{align-items:center;}}
